src: U-pek-\"an t\"a ts'aji. \textbf{Ix-much} uy-\"al-e' tan u-k'ajalin: ya' k\"a-x-e k\"a-xik'-e' \textbf{aj-y\"ax}.
trs: He [the crab] spoke to it [the frog]. \textbf{The frog} talked in his mind: ``I'm going to make a fool of \textbf{the crab}".

src: Y-\"al-i  \textbf{balum}: ``k\"a-x-e t\"a och-e tan noj bujchach".

src: I ya'-i u-nuk't-i \textbf{un-tu} \textbf{aj-pum}. \textnormal{{\ob}...{\cb}} u-k'ech-i \textbf{aj-pum}. \textnormal{{\ob}...{\cb}} i u-bis-an \textbf{aj-pum} t-u-chejpa.
